tool_description: Analyzes lead behavior patterns and engagement history to calculate behavioral propensity scores for purchase intent assessment.

email_engagement.description: Email engagement metrics: opens, clicks, replies, forwards

website_activity.description: Website activity metrics: visits, page_views, time_spent, downloads

social_engagement.description: Social media engagement: follows, shares, comments, mentions

time_window_days.description: Time window for behavior analysis in days (1-365)

error_messages: Invalid engagement metrics: email_engagement and website_activity must contain exactly 4 numbers each.
Invalid content engagement: content_engagement must contain exactly 3 numbers if provided.
Invalid social engagement: social_engagement must contain exactly 4 numbers if provided.
Invalid time window: time_window_days must be between 1 and 365.
Invalid recency weight: recency_weight must be between 0 and 1.
usage: Provide email_engagement and website_activity arrays with engagement metrics. Optionally include content_engagement and social_engagement. Adjust time_window_days and recency_weight for analysis scope.

engagement_breakdown.description: Scores for email, website, content, and social engagement

trend_indicator.description: Engagement trend: increasing, stable, or decreasing

peak_activity_date.description: Date of highest activity within analysis window
